capability.name: Financial Instrument Valuation Models
capability.definition: Not explicitly provided in the document
capability.role: Develop and maintain a portfolio of valuation models considering currency, interest rate, instrument quotes, indices, commodity prices and other market, liquidity and credit risk factors. Support the use of these models in trading and pricing activity
capability.example: Financial engineers assess the coverage and currency of the portfolio of valuation models and update certain models accordingly

key_features.name: Develop and maintain valuation models
key_features.description: Enables develop and maintain valuation models to support not explicitly provided in the document

key_features.name: Consider various risk factors

key_features.name: Support trading and pricing activities
key_features.description: Enables support trading and pricing activities to support not explicitly provided in the document
